D

DAO - package DAO
 
Delete - Class in Servlets
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a form that collects the details of which book to delete and posts them
Delete() - Constructor for class Servlets.Delete
 
deleteBook(int) - Method in class DAO.BookDao
The purpose of this function is to remove a record from the database based on a book's ID
DeleteResult - Class in Servlets
The purpose of this class is to build a HTML page with a table that shows the deleted book and to update the database by deleting the record
DeleteResult() - Constructor for class Servlets.DeleteResult
 
displayMenu() - Method in class ConsoleMenu.ConsoleMenu
The purpose of this function is to set and display the main menu's title, menu items and message and set the error message
displaySubMenu() - Method in class ConsoleMenu.ConsoleMenu
The purpose of this function is to set and display the sub menu's title, menu items and message and set the error message
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.Add
The purpose of this function is to build a HTML page with a form that collects the details for a new book and post them the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.AllBooks
The purpose of this function is to build a HTML page with a table and call an ArrayList from the BookDao database to fill the table the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.Delete
The purpose of this function is to build a HTML page with a form that collects the details of which book to delete and post them the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.LogoutServlet
the purpose of this function is redirect to the RootServlet login page
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.MainServlet
The purpose of this function is to build a HTML page with a series of buttons with navigation links to other pages and a logout form
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.RootServlet
The purpose of this function is to build a HTML page with a form that will collect the users username and password and post them if an incorrect entry is made an error message will display at the top of the screen
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.Search
The purpose of this function is to build a HTML page several hidden forms and buttons that reveal the forms the page will post the form that the user submits the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.Update
The purpose of this function is to build a HTML page with a form that collects the ID number of a book and a new price and post them the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.AddResult
The purpose of this function is to build a page with a table that displays the new book just added the function will also update the books database with the new record the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.DeleteResult
The purpose of this function is to build a page with a table that displays the book just deleted the function will also update the books database by deleting the record the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.LoginServlet
The purpose of this function is to validate the username and password that was input on the RootServlet if the login matches then they are redirected to the MainServlet, otherwise user's are redirected to the RootServlet with an error message
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.LogoutServlet
The purpose of this function is to call the doGet once logout is used
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.SearchResult
The purpose of this function is to conduct a search on the database with the details from the search form the function build a HTML page with a table to display the results the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlets.UpdateResult
The purpose of this function is to build a page with a table that displays the book just updated the function will also update the books database record the function will also build navigation buttons onto the page to redirect to the user to other pages
